statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT customer_id, email, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE last_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Sports' OR preference_2 = 'Music';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE first_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND last_name NOT LIKE '%son%';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT email, preference_type FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_value = 'Yes';
SELECT DISTINCT preference_type FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT preference_value, customer_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Discount';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'color'
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_type IN ('size','price') AND customer_id = 200 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, cm.campaign_name, cm.start_date FROM customers c JOIN campaign_customers ON c.customer_id = campaign_customers.customer_id JOIN campaigns cm ON campaign_customers.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM campaign_customers GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_customers > 5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, preference_1 FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE preference_1 = 'Value1' AND preference_2 = 'Value2';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.price > 50;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, c.preference_1, c.preference_2, pr.category FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE c.preference_1 = 'Preferred' AND pr.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE LENGTH(template_content) > 100;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE preference_name='theme' AND preference_value='dark';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, p.preference_name, p.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT ce.recipient_email, et.template_name, ce.sent_date FROM campaign_emails ce JOIN email_templates et ON ce.template_id = et.template_id WHERE ce.campaign_id = 1;
